Name: Ice Star
About the game: Hello!, The story begins then the Colony on the Ice star is raided, and the mining spaceship is captured, the Captain must do something to save his men and the mining colony from the raiders. The Game 3d shooter , includes many different items and weapons to use in game, Interesting mini quests as this is a shooter game with ammo and weapons, free open scene world for this part of story, there you can move in any direction, just be sure you are ready for the new challenge, and many characters that will tell you important information, but not all will be happy to share their information in some cases. In game there are not only weapons and some items to use, there are -Score, you can get then you play and fight some enemy, and different -Statuses, that will change with time you play, this futures will make you more friendly to the characters in game, and they will change their minds about you, some will like you some will not, depending on what you are doing in the game, game will change. Thank God , the Captain survives and escapes to the cold and dark planet surface, He can not go back to the mining ship, and must do something to stop the raiders, but he is not alone, Big Boss, who pays the raiders to control the area, is keeping a secret laboratory with partial stealth technology, and will do all to secure his business. Use keys, W,A,S,D to move, and mouse to look around, shoot and Zoom with weapons, F for flashlight, Shift to run, E to use items in game, 1-9, 0, Weapons. The story will change depend on your activity in game, Thank and have fun.
